arguments.template:
• {{app.title}}
{{application_name}} © Libriciel SCOP 2006-{{current_year}}
  • Libriciel Libriciel
styles: a,abbr,acronym,address,applet,article,aside,audio,b,big,blockquote,body,canvas,caption,center,cite,code,dd,del,details,dfn,div,dl,dt,em,embed,fieldset,figcaption,figure,footer,form,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,header,hgroup,html,i,iframe,img,ins,kbd,label,legend,li,main,mark,menu,nav,object,ol,output,p,pre,q,ruby,s,samp,section,small,span,strike,strong,sub,summary,sup,table,tbody,td,tfoot,th,thead,time,tr,tt,u,ul,var,video{border:0;font:inherit;font-size:100%;margin:0;padding:0;vertical-align:baseline}article,aside,details,figcaption,figure,footer,header,hgroup,main,menu,nav,section{display:block}[hidden]{display:none}body{line-height:1}ol,ul{list-style:none}blockquote,q{quotes:none}blockquote:after,blockquote:before,q:after,q:before{content:"";content:none}table{border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0}.ls-footer{-ms-flex-align:center;-ms-flex-pack:justify;-webkit-box-align:center;-webkit-box-pack:justify;align-items:center;background-color:#222;color:#d3d3d3;display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;font-family:Ubuntu,sans-serif;font-size:14px;justify-content:space-between;position:relative;text-align:center;z-index:10}.ls-footer .ls-footer-item{-ms-flex:0 0 auto;-webkit-box-flex:0;flex:0 0 auto;height:18px;margin:0 24px;width:128px}.ls-footer .ls-footer-item.ls-auto-size{height:auto;width:auto}:host:not(.ls-login-footer) .ls-footer{height:30px}:host:not(.ls-login-footer) .ls-hide-when-no-login{display:none}:host.ls-login-footer .ls-footer{height:40px}:host.ls-login-footer .ls-hide-when-login{display:none}:host.ls-footer-fixed-bottom .ls-footer{bottom:0;position:fixed;width:100%}.ls-icon-list{display:-webkit-inline-box;display:-ms-inline-flexbox;display:inline-flex}.ls-icon-list li{list-style:none;margin:auto 4px auto auto}.ls-icon-list a{-webkit-transition:opacity .1s;background:url(data:image/png;base64,) no-repeat;background-size:384px auto;display:inline-block;height:20px;margin:auto;opacity:.4;text-align:left;text-indent:-5000px;transition:opacity .1s;width:17px}.ls-icon-list a.active,.ls-icon-list a:hover{opacity:1}.ls-icon-list .asalae{background-position:0 0}.ls-icon-list .idelibre{background-position:-16px 0}.ls-icon-list .iparapheur{background-position:-33px 0}.ls-icon-list .pastell{background-position:-51px 0}.ls-icon-list .s2low{background-position:-67px 0}.ls-icon-list .webdpo{background-position:-87px 0}.ls-icon-list .webdelib{background-position:-102px 0}.ls-icon-list .webgfc{background-position:-122px 0}.ls-icon-list .libriciel{background-position:-151px 0}.ls-icon-list .s2low{width:20px}.ls-icon-list .webdpo{width:16px}.ls-icon-list .webdelib{width:20px}.ls-icon-list .libriciel{width:120px}.ls-icon-list .libriciel-colors:hover{background-position:-268px 0}@media only screen and (max-width:768px){.ls-xs-hide{display:none}.ls-footer-item:nth-child(2){margin-right:0!important}.ls-footer-item:nth-child(3){margin-left:0!important}}

arguments.template:
Merci d'installer l'extension LiberSign Erreur lors de la récupération des certificats
Chargement des certificats disponibles en cours...
Chargement de l'applet de signature en cours...
Récupération des informations de signature en cours...
Signature en cours...
Nom Émetteur Date d'expiration
{{cert.verifiedWith[0]}} {{cert.CN}} {{cert.ISSUERDN}} {{cert.NOTAFTER | date:'dd/MM/yyyy'}}
styles: .libersign-container{-ms-flex-align:center;-ms-flex-direction:column;-ms-flex-pack:center;-webkit-box-align:center;-webkit-box-direction:normal;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-box-pack:center;align-items:center;display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}.libersign-container.min-height{min-height:150px}.fa-star{margin-right:5px}.label-RGS{background-color:var(--ls-success-400);background-color:#5cb85c}.label-ADULLACT{background-color:var(--ls-info-400);background-color:#5bc0de}.label-LIBRICIEL{background-color:var(--ls-primary-500);background-color:#428bca}.label-EIDAS{background-color:var(--ls-grey-500);background-color:#999}.label-ETAT{background-color:var(--ls-warning-400);background-color:#f0ad4e}.certs-loaded{width:100%}table{text-align:left}.table td,.table th{padding:.3rem}tr{cursor:pointer}tr.active{background-color:var(--ls-primary-200);background-color:#b1dfff}tr.active>td{background-color:transparent!important}.center{text-align:center}#appletLibersign{height:0}.libersign-action-buttons>*{margin-left:1rem}.lds-roller{display:inline-block;height:80px;position:relative;width:80px}.lds-roller div{-ms-transform-origin:40px 40px;-webkit-animation:lds-roller 1.2s cubic-bezier(.5,0,.5,1) infinite;-webkit-transform-origin:40px 40px;animation:lds-roller 1.2s cubic-bezier(.5,0,.5,1) infinite;transform-origin:40px 40px}.lds-roller div:after{background:#000;border-radius:50%;content:" ";display:block;height:7px;margin:-4px 0 0 -4px;position:absolute;width:7px}.lds-roller div:first-child{-webkit-animation-delay:-36ms;animation-delay:-36ms}.lds-roller div:first-child:after{left:63px;top:63px}.lds-roller div:nth-child(2){-webkit-animation-delay:-72ms;animation-delay:-72ms}.lds-roller div:nth-child(2):after{left:56px;top:68px}.lds-roller div:nth-child(3){-webkit-animation-delay:-.108s;animation-delay:-.108s}.lds-roller div:nth-child(3):after{left:48px;top:71px}.lds-roller div:nth-child(4){-webkit-animation-delay:-.144s;animation-delay:-.144s}.lds-roller div:nth-child(4):after{left:40px;top:72px}.lds-roller div:nth-child(5){-webkit-animation-delay:-.18s;animation-delay:-.18s}.lds-roller div:nth-child(5):after{left:32px;top:71px}.lds-roller div:nth-child(6){-webkit-animation-delay:-.216s;animation-delay:-.216s}.lds-roller div:nth-child(6):after{left:24px;top:68px}.lds-roller div:nth-child(7){-webkit-animation-delay:-.252s;animation-delay:-.252s}.lds-roller div:nth-child(7):after{left:17px;top:63px}.lds-roller div:nth-child(8){-webkit-animation-delay:-.288s;animation-delay:-.288s}.lds-roller div:nth-child(8):after{left:12px;top:56px}@-webkit-keyframes lds-roller{0%{-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);transform:rotate(0deg)}to{-webkit-transform:rotate(1turn);transform:rotate(1turn)}}@keyframes lds-roller{0%{-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);transform:rotate(0deg)}to{-webkit-transform:rotate(1turn);transform:rotate(1turn)}}

.background{background:var(--ls-primary-100);border-radius:50%;height:100%;position:absolute;width:100%}.time-picker-header{-ms-flex-align:center;-ms-flex-pack:center;-webkit-box-align:center;-webkit-box-pack:center;align-items:center;background-color:var(--ls-primary-500);color:#fff;display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;font-size:3.2rem;justify-content:center}.time-picker-header *{opacity:.4}.time-picker-header .active{opacity:1}.time-picker-header .pointer-event{cursor:pointer}.time-picker-footer{-ms-flex-pack:distribute;justify-content:space-around}.time-picker-footer,.wrapper{-ms-flex-align:center;-webkit-box-align:center;align-items:center;display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex}.wrapper{-ms-flex-pack:center;-webkit-box-pack:center;background:rgba(0,0,0,.3);bottom:0;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;justify-content:center;left:0;position:fixed;right:0;top:0;z-index:9999}
